question: Which of the following statements are true about <katex>$[NiCl_4]^{2-}$</katex>?
a. The complex has tetrahedral geometry
b. Co-ordination number of Ni is 2 and oxidation state is +4
c. The complex is <katex>$sp^3$</katex> hybridised
d. It is a high spin complex
e. The complex is paramagnetic
explanation: Cl is a weak field ligand, so no pairing occurs.
It has unpaired electrons, so it is paramagnetic and high spin.
